refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: This class can hold Search and Sort criterions and provide an iterator that follows these restrictions.

warning.para: Changing this attribute won't change the behaviour of iterators that were previously returned by iterator.
Changing this attribute won't change the behaviour of iterators that were previously returned by iterator.

refsect2.title: iterator (self, iterator)
refsect2.para: Returns a new iterator that will loop over the elements of the iterator passed as argument, but according to the current filtering.
